detaileddescription.para: Used for anti-theft alarm system

Reflects that steering wheel is on the right
values 1U
Used for anti-theft alarm system

Indicates a left rear door contact
values 3U
Used for anti-theft alarm system

Indicates a right rear door contact
values 4U
Used in functions to check the activation of DTCs.

Used to check if some DTCs are active, and if they are active, some signals shall pe write to 0, otherwise to 1.
Value is DEM_UDS_STATUS_TF, which is 0x01U. This indicates the first bit of RTE_TYPE_Dem_EventStatusExtendedType(defines the Event Status byte). If this bit is set to 1, it represents that the test failed.

ECU_StateRequest for DWA component
range - see values values FALSE - Release state run from DWA library TRUE - Request state run from DWA library unit n.a resolution n.a context task context protection none storage class init ram
qtg_table_req_type enum variable

This variable will store the request made by QTG Beep
range see qtg_table_req_type enum values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class init ram
This flag shows that the lib was initialized

Allows the library's functions to run
range True if DWA_InitVarFunc is called False otherwise values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class init ram
DWA_Internal_t structure variable

Stores DWA internal data
range see DWA_Internal_t structure values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class init ram
RTE structure for enStDWAAlarmquelle signal

RTE structure for enStDWAAlarmquelle signal. This structure is defined in Rte_DWA.c
range Rte_DES_uint8 - see Rte_DWA_Type.h values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWA_PostAllRunnablesHook_Stub protection none storage class init ram
RTE structure for bHSBruchErkannt signal

RTE structure for bHSBruchErkannt signal. This structure is defined in Rte_DWA.c
range Rte_DES_boolean - see Rte_DWA_Type.h values N/A unit N/A resolution N/A context DWA_PreAllRunnablesHook_Stub protection none storage class init ram
Monitor the rear window breakage

Set bHSBruchErkannt value to 0 if the rear window breakage monitoring is not active.

SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1668
Anti-theft alarm system

Sets the value of the enStDWAAlarmquelle signal (used to indicate a DWA alarm reason) depending on the position of the steering wheel and the position of the door
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
RECHSTLENKER [in] RECHSTDWAALARM [in] LINKSTDWAALARM [in]
reentrant No context task Model Task thread safe Yes multicore safe No synchronous
Input->Output-Correlation
If steering wheel is on the right (RECHSTLENKER) and rear door contact is left/right then set enStDWAAlarmquelle to LINKSTDWAALARM/RECHSTDWAALARM
Call Sequence
Test Method
The testing method is described on:
Verification criteria
Test case shall be created to check the enStDWAAlarmquelle value. TEST_DWA_Stubs__DWA_PostAllRunnablesHook_Stub Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1505

Helper function

Uses DWA_InternalStruct value to set the DWA Sounder states and request LIN scheduler table
DWA_RequestQTGBeep should be called before
N/A
void
void
Globals
DWA_InternalStruct [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
Based on the DWA_InternalStruct status, it is set the DWA states on LIN scheduler.
reentrant No context task thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Call Sequence

The test method is described in:

Traceability

Set the status of 0x04090E DTC

Reports a possible internal Fehler (error) for DWA sensor.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
DWA_TASK_DWA_verbaut [in] DWA_TASK_sensor_aktiv [in] DWA_TASK_fehler [in] DWA_TASK_normal [in] DEM_EVENT_STATUS_PREFAILED [in] DEM_EVENT_STATUS_PREPASSED [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
Assuming the DWA is installed and one of the DWA sensors (IRUE, NGS) is active, If dwa sensor has an internal error then set the DTC 04090E to active,
reentrant No context DWA_SensorAdapter function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in: Criteria The testcase shall be created to check 0x04090E status. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_SensorAdapter__InternalFehler

Satisfies requirement

void

Input->Output-Correlation
Assuming the DWA is installed, NGS sensor is active and DWA_InternalStruct structure has flagDTC member to true, If DWASensor_NGS_Winkel_unplaus signal is set to unplausibel then set the DTC to active, If DWASensor_NGS_Winkel_unplaus signal is set to plausibel then set the DTC to inactive.
reentrant No context DWA_SensorAdapter function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Call Sequence

Enabling conditions

This function enables conditions for DWA Sensor DTCs
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
DWA_InternalStruct [in, out] DWA_TASK_DWA_TIMER_DTC [in] DWA_TASK_DWA_NO_ARM_STATE [in] DWA_TASK_DWA_ARMING_STATE [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If DWA has the arming status (received from enStDWAStatus signal) and previous state wasn't arming state, then set DWA_InternalStruct.counter to 0 and set DWA_InternalStruct.flagDTC to true If conditions can be activated, if the timeout has not expired then increment DWA_InternalStruct.counter otherwise, reset enable condition flag and the counter Enable conditions status shall be sent using DWA_DTC_enable signal.
reentrant No context DWA_SensorAdapter function thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check the DWA_InternalStruct.counter, DWA_InternalStruct.flagDTC values and the set for enabling conditions. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_SensorAdapter__EnableDTC_T1 TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_SensorAdapter__EnableDTC_T2
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. This is a helper function that enables DTC conditions

Input->Output-Correlation
Assuming that DWA is installed and LIN sounder installed,
if there is an error (Fehler) on Sounder_Error, then set the DTC to active
if Sounder_Error has a normal behavior, then set the DTC to inactive

Handles DWA status and LIN Scheduler table

Sets the DWA status based on the arming status.
N/A
N/A
p
- pointer to enum used for saving the LIN scheduler status range DWA_SounderScheduleStatusEnum resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
DWA_NO_REQUEST [in] DWA_ARMED [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If DWA Sounder isn't armed, then set the status to DWA_NO_REQUEST, otherwise set to DWA_ARMED
reentrant No context DWA_LinScheduler thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous The arming status can be taken from DWA_LIN_heartbeat.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check the DWA status, DWA_NO_REQUEST and DWA_ARMED. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_LinScheduler__DWA_STARTUP_INIT
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1448

void
Globals
DWA_ARMING [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If bStrgSNDSchaerfen is set to 1, then the status to DWA_ARMING and request main schedule table
reentrant No context DWA_LinScheduler thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous Request for main schedule table is from from DWA_LIN_heartbeat.

Handles DWA status and request LIN Scheduler table

Sets the DWA status based on the Sounder status.
N/A
N/A
p
- pointer to enum used for saving the LIN scheduler status range DWA_SounderScheduleStatusEnum resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
DWA_ARMED [in] DWA_NO_REQUEST [in] DWA_TASK_unscharf [in] IpduStatus_Sounders_01 [in] - contains the Sounder status that is routed Rte_StatusMask_TimeoutError [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If the Sounder status is "unscharf" and the Sounder timeout exceeded, then set the status to DWA_NO_REQUEST and request main schedule table If the Sounder status is "scharf", then set the status to DWA_ARMED and request short schedule table.
reentrant No context DWA_LinScheduler thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous The Sounder timeout is on RTE level and is computed based on IpduStatus_Sounders_01. The requests for schedule tabels are from DWA_LIN_heartbeat.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check DWA status and the requests for LIN scheduler table. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_LinScheduler__DWA_ARMING
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1440 SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1438

void

Input->Output-Correlation
If the Sounder status is "scharf" and the Sounder timeout exceeded, then set the status to DWA_ARMED and request short schedule table If the Sounder status is "unscharf", then set the status to DWA_NO_REQUEST and request main schedule table.
reentrant No context DWA_LinScheduler thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous The Sounder timeout is on RTE level and is computed based on IpduStatus_Sounders_01. The requests for schedule tabels are from DWA_LIN_heartbeat.
Call Sequence

Handles DWA status and request LIN Scheduler table

Sets the DWA status based on the Sounder trigger(ausloesen).
N/A
N/A
p
- pointer to enum used for saving the LIN scheduler status range DWA_SounderScheduleStatusEnum resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
DWA_ARMED [in] DWA_DISARMING [in] DWA_NO_REQUEST [in] DWA_TASK_unscharf [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If there is no trigger from Sounder and it's status is "scharf", then set the status to DWA_ARMED and request short schedule table If bStrgSNDSchaerfen is 0, then set the status to DWA_DISARMING and request main schedule table.
reentrant No context DWA_LinScheduler thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous The requests for schedule tabels are from DWA_LIN_heartbeat.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check DWA status and the requests for LIN scheduler table. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_LinScheduler__DWA_ALARM
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1449 SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1451
Handles DWA status and LIN request Scheduler table

Sets the DWA status based on the Sounder trigger(ausloesen).
N/A
N/A
p
- pointer to enum used for saving the LIN scheduler status range DWA_SounderScheduleStatusEnum resolution N/A unit N/A
void
Globals
DWA_ALARM [in] DWA_DISARMING [in] QTG_REQUEST_MASTER_TABLE [in] QTG_REQUEST_SHORT_TABLE [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If Sounder status received from bStrgSNDSchaerfenLIN is 0, then set the status to DWA_DISARMING and request main schedule table If Sounder trigger (ausloesen) is 1, then set the status to DWA_ALARM and request short schedule table. If QTGBeepRequest requests master table then, request main schedule table. If QTGBeepRequest requests short table then, request short schedule table.
reentrant No context DWA_LinScheduler thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous The requests for schedule tabels are from DWA_LIN_heartbeat. In this function it is covered also the switch to main/short table for QTG beep (sounder beep), see SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1680, SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1682 Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check DWA status and the requests for LIN scheduler table. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_LinScheduler__DWA_ARMED
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1442 SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1455
Sounder beep trigger

This function switches LIN schedule to master or short table depending on signal enStrgQTGBeepTyp. Should be cyclically call before DWA_LinScheduler.
N/A
DWA_LinScheduler
void
void
Globals
QTGBeepRequest [out] QTG_NO_REQUEST [in] QTG_REQUEST_MASTER_TABLE [in] QTG_REQUEST_SHORT_TABLE [in]
Input->Output-Correlation
If a transition is detected on enStrgQTGBeepTyp from 0->1 or 0->2, then request master table, else request short table.
reentrant No context task thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
The testcase shall be created to check enStrgQTGBeepTyp transitions. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_RequestQTGBeep
Traceability
Satisfies requirement
SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1680 SWR_ICAS1_L3_DWA_1682
Initialize the variables for the DWA module.

This function is called by ModelsTask(Scheduler) before starting the model (MmDoSetup is called). The code here must be short.
N/A
N/A
void
void
Globals
DWA_boRun [out] DWA_InternalStruct [out]
reentrant No context task Model Task thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous

DWA_boRun is set to TRUE DWA_InternalStruct members are initialised.
Call Sequence
Test Method
The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
Test case shall be created to check the DWAX function call, if DWA_InternalStruct was initialised and DWA_boRun was updated. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_InitVarFunc
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. According to the architecture this is a helper function which set the value of the DWA_boRun and initialise DWA_InternalStruct members
Stop callback for the DWA module.

This function is called by ModelsTask (Scheduler) when the StopEv is set (MmDoStop is called). Here is a good place to save data to NvRAM.
N/A
N/A
void
void

reentrant No context task Model Task thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous
Input->Output-Correlation
DWA_boRun is set to FALSE

The test method is described in:
Verification criteria
Test case shall be created to check the DWAX function call and the DWA_boRun value. TEST_DWA_Task__DWA_Stop
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. According to the architecture this is a helper function which set the value of the DWA_boRun
Cyclic function of the DWA module.

This function is called by ModelsTask (Scheduler) when the model's recurrence occurs. This function should be performed with a cycle time of 10 ms.
Must be called after DWA_InitVarFunc.
N/A
void
void
Globals

reentrant No context task Model Task thread safe No multicore safe No synchronous

If DWA_boRun is true the full functionality of the DWA module is called

detaileddescription.para: File used to set DWA Sensor Sirene DTC values, DWA states, request LIN scheduler tables. It is also called functions from DWA lib and DWAX module.
